data.quote: And when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Life has a way of testing a person’s will, either by having nothing happen at all or by having everything happen at once.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: One day you will wake up and there won’t be any more time to do the things you’ve always wanted. Do it now.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Be Brave. Take Risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: If you want to be successful, you must respect one rule – Never lie to yourself.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: The act of discovering  who we are will force us to accept that we can go further than we think.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: The secret of life is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Don’t waste your time with explanations, people only hear what they want to hear.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Don’t give in to your fears. If you do, you won’t be able to talk to your heart.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: At a certain point in our lives, we lose control of what’s happening to us, and our lives become controlled by fate. That’s the world’s greatest lie.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: When you repeat a mistake, it is not a mistake anymore: it is a decision.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: People are capable at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: It’s the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: My favorite things in life don’t cost any money. It’s really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: I’m as proud of many of the things we haven’t done as the things we have done. Innovation is saying no to a thousand things.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the heart, you’ll know when you find it.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow know what you truly want to become.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: I think if you do something and it turns out pretty good, then you should go do something else wonderful, not dwell on it for too long. Just figure out what’s next.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.
data.author: Steve Jobs
